thread.title: Despite the Angels loss, Japan's got Ohtani fever

title: Despite the Angels loss, Japan's got Ohtani fever
text:
Despite the Angels loss, Japan's got Ohtani fever 8:10pm IST - 01:37 
Shohei Ohtani has been compared to American baseball legends of yore in the short time since he's been playing in the United States. But despite a huge loss on Tuesday, his fans in his homeland Japan are still hooked. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Shohei Ohtani has been compared to American baseball legends of yore in the short time since he's been playing in the United States. But despite a huge loss on Tuesday, his fans in his homeland Japan are still hooked.
